attributes.action: give babies miscarried in the first trimester recognition by birth/death certificate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many mothers and fathers that have babies who have died in utero during the first trimester feel cheated and lost at the horrible fact that there was no evidence for their child. 

If a death certificate is issued for them, it may help parents who have no memories of their child cope.

I know it would most certainly help me.
